nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 2: The Cavern of Screaming Skulls
Star Wars Adventures 2: The Cavern of Screaming Skulls was the second installment of Scholastic's Star Wars Adventures series.

After the fallout of the Sun Runner incident, the Jedi are stranded in the jungles of Nallastia, where hostile natives send them on a quest to recover sacred gems said to hold the key to an ancient prophecy.
